titles: The schism of the Church of England &c. demonstrated in four arguments formerly propos'd to Dr. Gunning and Dr. Pearson, the late Bishops of Ely and Chester / by two Catholick disputants, in a celebrated conference upon that point.
author: Spencer, John, 1601-1671.
Gunning, Peter, 1614-1684.
Pearson, John, 1613-1686.
Lenthall, John, Sir, 1625-1681.
Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Reprinted from Spencer's Schisme unmask't (p. 637-655 of the 1658 edition).
Also attributed to John Sergeant by Wing.
Wing lists title as "The Schism of the Church of England &c. remonstrated.
The two Catholic disputants are John Spencer and John Lenthall.
